name: We have this Hope as an Anchor for the Soul
description: We, from Walk the Same, believe that all children deserve a chance at life and this T-Shirt, designed by us, is finally here to support that cause. For about $1 a day, you'll provide children in need with access to life-saving basics like: + Clean water + Nutritious food + Healthcare + Education + And more! We are campaigning for World Vision in Uganda to start with and the profits that we get out of this initiative will be donated over to them so that we could help change the lives of these awesome kids who are very much in need of our help. The artwork of our t-shirt is inspired from Hebrews 6:19 – “We have this Hope as an Anchor for the Soul, firm and secure.” Let us help give Hope to these children who are broken by hardships that surround them and let us be the light that shines in their dark world. Thank You for all the support and for being a Blessing to these children in need. Let us be the voice for those who can't speak out and let us make a difference in this world we live in. Many Blessings, + Walk the Same team PS: We would appreciate it if you could take the time to help spread the word to your friends and family. Pricing USD: $ 19.69 GBP: £ 13.00 Sizing Chart + Small – Width: 18.5" (Bust: 37”) + Medium – Width: 19.5" (Bust: 39”) + Large – Width: 21" (Bust: 42”) Note We serve worldwide but if for some reason it says otherwise- for your country, do not hesitate to contact us and we will sort it out for you.
